backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles and project CRUD with access control and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dark‑mode UI updates and public project page theme alignment with related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind OKLCH theme tokens for light/dark modes, including background, foreground, and component color variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with router, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and ThemeProvider defaulting to dark mode.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal requiring first‑time users to enter a display name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/editor/EditorFor: Form for editing project title, tagline, body, and theme using card components and inputs.
frontend/src/components/editor/ProjectPr: Project content preview rendering markdown to HTML with theme‑dependent styling.
frontend/src/components/editor/ThemePick: A theme selector component using radio buttons to choose between light, dark, or custom themes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with header, footer, and user greeting, wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Contains dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting projects with form handling and mutation calls.
Displays a grid of project cards with actions for editing, viewing, renaming, deleting, and opening projects.
frontend/src/components/projects/ShareSe: Shows a public project URL and provides a copy-to-clipboard button with feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, projects, and project state via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark OKLCH color variables plus base element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays the user's project list with create, edit, and delete dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectEditor.tsx: Provides an editor for updating, publishing, and previewing a single project.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProject.tsx: Renders a publicly accessible project page with simple markdown parsing and theme support.
frontend/src/pages/SignedOut.tsx: Landing page for signed‑out users with marketing content and login button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query strings or hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes with OKLCH variables, custom components, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, versioning, and implemented features for an app-building platform, including authentication, project dashboard, editor, preview, publishing, sharing, and theming requirements.
